column1: '''''úre''''' is a noun meaning "heat" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>
left]]''Úre'' is the name in Quenya of the thirty-sixth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  When used as a consonant it represents '''W'''.<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref>  However, in the [[Mode of Beleriand]], as seen as in the inscription on the [[Doors of Durin
column5: II4}}</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Au'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: <!-- An extra blank line is inserted to prevent the Etymology title from indenting. -->
The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
